GK19appvairu:5: rājño bibheti loko rājānaḥ punarito 'pi vairibhyaḥ /
GK19appvairu:7: bhikṣāpradā jananyaḥ pitaro guravaḥ kumārakāḥ śiṣyāḥ /
GK19appvairu:10: santasta eva muktāḥ saṃdehe gautamaḥ sākṣī // AppVs_5 //
GK19appvairu:11: patatu nabhaḥ sphuṭatu mahī calantu girayo milantu vāridhayaḥ /
GK19appvairu:13: ke corāḥ ke piśunāha ke ripavaḥ ke 'pi dāyādāḥ /
GK19appvairu:14: jagadakhilaṃ tasya vaśe yasya vaśe syādidaṃ cetaḥ // AppVs_7 //
GK19appvairu:16: āntaramekaṃ karaṇaṃ śāntaṃ yadi kā tataścintā // AppVs_8 //
GK19appvairu:20: paripākaḥ saṃsaraṇaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ naiṣṭhikī śāntiḥ // AppVs_10 //
GK19appvairu:23: śaiśavamiva kaumāre tattaruṇimnīva sa iva vṛddhatve /
GK19appvairu:24: na svadate dhīrāṇāṃ kāmasya viceṣṭitaṃ śāntau // AppVs_12 //
GK19appvairu:26: kākā iva vāntāśanamanye tāneva sevante // AppVs_13 //
GK19appvairu:28: kartavye 'pi premaṇi kathamiha dhīrā virajyante // AppVs_14 //
GK19appvairu:30: dharaṇidharā iva santastatra na kiṃcitprakampante // AppVs_15 //
GK19appvairu:32: santaḥ śamasukharasikāḥ sudhāśanāḥ sūkarānna iva // AppVs_16 //
GK19appvairu:36: anuvartante dhīrāḥ pitara iva krīḍato bālān // AppVs_18 //
GK19appvairu:37: puṣṇati puruṣe salilairmuṣṇati puṣpaṃ phalaṃ ca tarava iva /
GK19appvairu:38: vartante santaḥ samamupakartari cāpakartari ca // AppVs_19 //
GK19appvairu:40: sa viveko yaḥ śāntikṛdaviveko 'nyaḥ samasto 'pi // AppVs_20 //
GK19appvairu:41: anadhigate kāmasukhe kālena yathā pravartate taruṇaḥ /
GK19appvairu:42: evaṃ brahmasukhe 'pi pravartate ko 'pi bhāgyavaśāt // AppVs_21 //
GK19appvairu:45: kā me gatiriti pṛcchati caramaśvāse 'pi yaḥ svārtham /
GK19appvairu:46: tasya janasyāpi kṛte pāpāḥ pāpāni kurvanti // AppVs_23 //
GK19appvairu:51: nītijñā niyatijñā vedajñā api bhavanti śāstrajñāḥ /
GK19appvairu:52: brahmajñā api labhyāḥ svājñānajñānino viralāḥ // AppVs_26 //
GK19appvairu:53: kalikaluṣe manasi sve kathamiva jagadārjavaṃ labhate /
GK19appvairu:54: cakṣurdoṣe jāgrati candradvitvaṃ kuto yātu // AppVs_27 //
GK19appvairu:56: dṛśi deyamauṣadhaṃ ko dṛśye dattvā sukhī bhavati // AppVs_28 //
GK19appvairu:58: rodanaśaraṇā jananī paralokagatasya ko bandhuḥ // AppVs_29 //
GK19appvairu:61: kalahāyante mūḍhāḥ kaḥ pratibhūḥ śvaḥ prabhāta iti /
GK19appvairu:62: tasyāmeva rajanyāṃ kaḥ pratibhūḥ svasya sattāyām // AppVs_31 //
GK19appvairu:64: krītā balino mahipāḥ kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma iti manyante // AppVs_32 //
GK19appvairu:65: ā prapadamā śiraskaṃ cāntaḥ kalimalamalīmase vapuṣi /
GK19appvairu:67: daṇḍyaṃ yatsukhahetoḥ puṣṇanti janāḥ kathaṃ tadeva vapuḥ /
GK19appvairu:70: puṇyena yadi na muhyati putrāneva smaranmriyate // AppVs_35 //
GK19appvairu:72: tuhinavyathānivṛttyai nahi veśmani pāvako deyaḥ // AppVs_36 //
GK19appvairu:76: anne khalvatimukte vamanaṃ vā syādvireko vā // AppVs_38 //
GK19appvairu:78: āviṣṭa iva piśācyā puruṣastṛṣṇāvaśaṃ yātaḥ // AppVs_39 //
GK19appvairu:85: na khalu dhanatvaṃ jātiryasya yadiṣṭaṃ tadeva tasya dhanam /
GK19appvairu:88: svīkriyate yadi śāntiḥ svātmāpi svasya bhavati na vā // AppVs_44 //
GK19appvairu:90: yadapatrapate nāntarbhāvālābhaḥ sa kasya samaḥ // AppVs_45 //
GK19appvairu:92: culakenāmbhaḥ pātuṃ svanitavyaḥ kiṃ taṭāko 'pi // AppVs_46 //
GK19appvairu:96: abhinindantyalpasutāṃ kā gṛhiṇī kāmino hṛdyā // AppVs_48 //
GK19appvairu:97: yānti śucamakṛtadārā dve bhārye neti kṛtadārāḥ /
GK19appvairu:98: te paradārā neti strībhistṛptānna paśyāmaḥ // AppVs_49 //
GK19appvairu:100: tiryañca iti narā iti devā ityanyato bhedaḥ // AppVs_50 //
GK19appvairu:102: striya iti vihitaṃ vidhinā kiyadatra janā nimajjanti // AppVs_51 //
GK19appvairu:104: dārāḥ kartavyā iti kenedaṃ prahasanaṃ kathitam // AppVs_52 //
GK19appvairu:106: vāmāḥ striyo vimūḍhairupabhuñjānāḥ sukhaṃ viguṇam // AppVs_53 //
GK19appvairu:107: aśnīta pibata svādata jāgrata saṃviśata tiṣṭhata vā /
GK19appvairu:108: sakṛdapi cintayatāhnaḥ sāvadhiko dehabandha iti // AppVs_54 //
GK19appvairu:109: kiṃ vijitayā pṛthivyā kiṃ kāñcanabhūbhṛtā karasthena /
GK19appvairu:110: kiṃ divyābhiḥ strībhirmartavye brahmaṇā likhite // AppVs_55 //
GK19appvairu:113: svalpo jīvanakālaḥ svalpā dhīḥ paricayaḥ svalpaḥ /
GK19appvairu:114: tadapi tarema kathaṃcicchrutayo yadi nopajāyante // AppVs_57 //
GK19appvairu:115: kuta āgataṃ na jāne kva nu vā gantavyamidamapi na jāne /
GK19appvairu:118: avayanti tu vispaṣṭaṃ taḍitābhihate śirasi mūḍhāḥ // AppVs_59 //
GK19appvairu:120: īdṛkṣo hi viśeṣaḥ svargaḥ svarga iti kiṃ tatra // AppVs_60 //
GK19appvairu:121: kopo maitrāvaruṇeḥ śāpo vā tārkikasya muneḥ /
GK19appvairu:122: saṃsmaryate yadi sakṛcchatrorapi māstu śakrapadam // AppVs_61 //
GK19appvairu:124: punarāgantavyaṃ yadi puṃsā kiṃ sādhitaṃ bhavati // AppVs_62 //
GK19appvairu:125: bhuktā bahavo dārā labdhāḥ putrāśca pautrāśca /
GK19appvairu:126: nītaṃ śatamapyāyuḥ satyaṃ vada martumasti manaḥ // AppVs_63 //
GK19appvairu:131: kiṃ na nigṛhṇanti manaḥ kiṃ na bhajante janāḥ śivaṃ śaraṇam /
GK19appvairu:134: bhogāya ca yogāya ca na kalpate durvidagdhānām // AppVs_67 //
GK19appvairu:137: ekadvāḥ kṣitipatiṣu dvitrā deveṣu pañcaṣā druhiṇe /
GK19appvairu:140: vikale cakṣuṣi tamasā vyādāya mukhaṃ kimīkṣeta // AppVs_70 //
GK19appvairu:142: api hṛṣyanti janāḥ kathamavalambya jñānakhadyotam // AppVs_71 //
GK19appvairu:143: ayutaṃ niyutaṃ vāpi pradiśantu prākṛtāya bhogāya /
GK19appvairu:144: krīṇanti na bilvadalaiḥ kaivalyaṃ pañcaṣairmūḍhāḥ // AppVs_72 //
GK19appvairu:146: nibhṛtaṃ yadi vartante kālena sraṃsate pāśaḥ // AppVs_73 //
GK19appvairu:148: stūyante sujanaiḥ kiṃ kaṇṭhe kurvanti kanakapāśamime // AppVs_74 //
GK19appvairu:152: kīdṛkkṛtāntapuramiti ko 'pi na jijñāsate lokaḥ // AppVs_76 //
GK19appvairu:154: kartavyo mamakāraḥ kiṃ tu sa sarvatra kartavyaḥ // AppVs_77 //
GK19appvairu:155: putrā iti dārā iti poṣyānmūrkho janānbrūte /
GK19appvairu:156: andhe tamasi nimajjannātmā poṣya iti nāvaiti // AppVs_78 //
GK19appvairu:160: karṣati manaso vṛttiṃ kulaṭeva kulastriyaṃ mugdhām // AppVs_80 //
GK19appvairu:166: na khalu vyatimucyante paśavaḥ pāśena saṃbaddhāḥ // AppVs_83 //
GK19appvairu:168: bhavitavyaṃ yadi nityavadarthaṃ mātuḥ pituścāstu // AppVs_84 //
GK19appvairu:169: dhanyāste bahudevāḥ svāmini yeṣāṃ na durbhikṣam /
GK19appvairu:170: jātu na jānīmo vayamekaṃ taṃ svāminaṃ pūrṇam // AppVs_85 //
GK19appvairu:171: santu bṛhanto devāḥ kiṃ tu na tānnantumīhate cetaḥ /
GK19appvairu:173: nidhyāyasi viṣayasukhaṃ na dhyāyasi viṣamamasya paripākam /
GK19appvairu:174: bandhuṃ tameva cintaya baddhuṃ moktuṃ ca yaḥ kṣamate // AppVs_87 //
GK19appvairu:177: kau pitarau kaḥ putraḥ kaḥ svāmī yaḥ prapañcasya /
GK19appvairu:178: pratyastamite bhede kimidaṃ kimidamiti vipraśnaḥ // AppVs_89 //
GK19appvairu:179: sa vidhiryatte vidadhati sa pratiṣedho yato nivartante /
GK19appvairu:182: viśvasihi śrutiśikharaṃ viśvamidaṃ tava nideśakaram // AppVs_91 //
GK19appvairu:183: bhavyamabhavyaṃ vā naḥ pralikhatu vedhāḥ sudurmedhāḥ /
GK19appvairu:184: savyamasavyaṃ vā naḥ śaraṇaṃ caraṇaṃ maheśasya // AppVs_92 //
GK19appvairu:185: vedhāḥ kathaṃ hariḥ kathamiti tu praśne vayaṃ mūkāḥ /
GK19appvairu:186: śivamekaṃ jānīmo na śivādanyaṃ vijānīmaḥ // AppVs_93 //
GK19appvairu:188: kā vā tataḥ kṣatirnaḥ śaivā vayamā caturvadanāt // AppVs_94 //
GK19appvairu:190: vidyeśvareṣu kaścana pitāmaho na iti visrambhaḥ // AppVs_95 //
GK19appvairu:192: ahamasmyahamasmīti prāptaḥ kalaho mama trāṇe // AppVs_96 //
GK19appvairu:195: jñātuṃ hātuṃ viṣayaṃ śrotuṃ mantuṃ gṛhītumātmānam /
GK19appvairu:196: vatsā yadi na hi ghaṭate tatsādhayatāvimuktāya // AppVs_98 //
GK19appvairu:197: sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ nigamā bhaktiḥ karma pratītiriti /
GK19appvairu:199: baddhaḥ kaste vakṣyati mukto muktiṃ vijānāti /
GK19appvairu:200: yāsyasi cedavimuktaṃ jñāsyasi viśveśvarasya mukhāt // AppVs_100 //
GK19appvairu:201: na gṛhītaṃ śrutihṛdayaṃ na ca na gṛhītaṃ pariplavaṃ hṛdayam /
GK19appvairu:202: icchāmi ca dhāma paraṃ gacchāmi tu viśvanāthapurīm // AppVs_101 //
